usefulItems: bowl, ceramic or glass bowl, glass bowl or large jug, nut milk bag or muslin cloth
title: Almond milk

preparations.content: Place a large ceramic or glass bowl onto mixing bowl lid and weigh almonds and water into it. Set aside to soak for 1 hour.
Place all ingredients, including soaked almonds and water, into mixing bowl and blend <b>2 min/speed 9<b>, until thick and creamy.
Pour mixture into nut milk bag or muslin cloth and firmly squeeze to extract milk into a large jug or glass bowl. Use milk as needed.

hintsAndTricks: Almond milk will last for up to 3 days in the refrigerator.
Use leftover almond pulp in cakes, breads, smoothies or as a base for protein balls.
Almonds are a source of both protein and calcium.
